蛓蛓蛓

蛓字的基本解释

蛓
cì
一种毛虫，刺蛾科黄刺蛾的幼虫。俗称“洋辣子”。

蛓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cì］
［《廣韻》七賜切，去寘，清。］
［《廣韻》七吏切，去志，清。］
蛓毛虫。

蛓字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蛓； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1081第15
【唐韻】【集韻】?七賜切，音刺。【說文】毛蟲也。【爾雅·釋蟲】蛁，毛蟲。【疏】蛁，一名毛蠹，卽蛓也。今俗呼爲毛蛓，有毒螫人。【王逸·九思】蛓緣兮我裳。　又【唐韻】七吏切。義同。　【玉篇】或作螆??蚝。【類篇】別作?。【集韻】又作?。又?。

考證：〔【爾雅·釋蟲】蜭，毛蟲。【疏】蜭一名毛蠹。〕　謹照原文兩蜭字?改蛁。毛蟲改毛蠹。
蛓字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蛓字的起名意思

暂无。

Cricket
Basic explanation of words
Cricket
cì
A caterpillar, the larva of the yellow spiny moth of the spine moth family. Commonly known as "foreign hot pepper".
Cricket
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cì］
["Guangyun" seven gifts cut, go set, clear. ]
["Guangyun" seven officials cut, go to record, clear. ]
Slug caterpillar.
Cricket
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蛓; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 1081 Page 15
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Seven gift cuts, sound thorns. [Said the text] Caterpillars too. [Erya·Release insects] worms, caterpillars. 【Sparse】a cricket, a moth beetle, also a cricket. Nowadays, they are called hair slugs, poisonous stingers. 【Wang Yi·Nine Thoughts】The fate is in my clothes.　[Tang Yun] Seven officials cut. The same meaning.　【Jade article】Or as a scorpion?? Oyster. 【Classes】Don’t make it?. [Ji Yun] Again? also?. Textual research: [[Erya·Release insects] worms, caterpillars. 【Sparse】A hairy beetle. 〕 　 Would you like to follow the original two words? Change 蛁. The caterpillar changed to the moth beetle.
Cricket
